product_name: Eider Aero Windstopper Softshell Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's ultra-breathable, minimalist Eider Aero Windstopper Softshell Jacket keeps chilly wind at bay while you tackle exposed peaks and ridgelines. GORE(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) Mesh offers lightweight windproofing and is exclusive to Eider. Durable water repellent finish. Fitted cut is ideal for alpine pursuits; pit zips vent excess heat. Collar as well as hem has an adjustable drawcord. Thumbholes extend coverage over the backs of hands. Eider Aero Windstopper Softshell Jacket for men has a zip chest pocket.
short_description: The men's ultra-breathable, minimalist Eider Aero Windstopper Softshell Jacket keeps chilly wind at bay while you tackle exposed peaks and ridgelines.
